name: Bloomberg Message Queue System
shortHook: Real-time data communication system using RabbitMQ and Docker.

description.overview: A message queue system developed during Bloomberg Tech Lab fellowship.
description.stackDescription: Implemented using Python, RabbitMQ, and Docker for efficient real-time data communication.
description.role: One of 40 selected fellows working with Bloomberg engineers.

name: The Vault
shortHook: A web application designed to help users manage their contacts.

description.overview: A contact management system built with LAMP stack for secure and efficient contact organization.
description.stackDescription: Implemented using Linux, Apache, MySQL, and PHP (LAMP stack) with deployment on Digital Ocean.
description.role: Full stack developer responsible for system architecture, database design, and deployment.
